message.name: ERR_PRODPROVISION_FV_CANCELLED_PRODUCT
message.locale: Product provision cannot be created because product provision cannot be associated with a canceled product.
Product provision cannot be created because product provision cannot be associated with a cancelled product.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTPROVISION_XRV_PROVISIONLOCATION_ACTIVE
message.locale: You cannot cancel this product provision as there are active provision locations.

message.name: ERR_PRODPROVISION_FV_CREATIONDATE_NO_MODIFY
message.locale: Creation date must not be modified.

message.name: ERR_CHANGESET_APPLY_FAILED_PRODUCT_PROVIDER_NOT_PRESENT
message.locale: The change set cannot be applied as product provider is not present.
